name: Dreamweave Silk
description: The screen is as soft as mist, adorned with bright stars. Looking back at a moment of joy, they fall into an endless dream.
effect: Physical Penetration +4%,When attacking a target, has a 100% chance to cast Stardust Sea, freezing the target for 3 seconds. (Freeze effect has an internal 10-second cooldown).

name: Drifting Air
description: No one can imagine the air's true shape, but there is one craftsman who can feel its circulation and wants to make something resembling it.

name: Dropping Doll (Female)
description: No matter how long the adventure journey you've travelled, don't forget your beginner's mind. Doll made by the cute girls of Kafra company in memory of this moment and to show the warmth and concern. (Although it's a girl-style doll, boys can wear it too.)
